summaries: The document is an annual report by Oracle Corporation for the fiscal year ending May 31, 2025. The company is incorporated in Delaware and has its principal executive offices in Austin, Texas. The securities registered with the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 include Common Stock (par value $0.01 per share) and 3.125% senior notes due July 2025. The company is a large accelerated filer and has filed all required reports during the preceding 12 months. The internal control over financial reporting was assessed effective as of the fiscal year ending May 31, 2025. As of June 13, 2025, there were 2,808,833,000 shares of common stock outstanding. No errors in previously issued financial statements were corrected, and no recovery analysis was required for incentive-based compensation received by executive officers during the relevant recovery period. The aggregate market value of the voting stock held by non-affiliates was $305,793,119,000 as of May 31, 2025. Documents incorporated by reference include portions of the company's definitive proxy statement for its 2025 annual meeting of stockholders.
